title: 01/26/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/26/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to Saints' Sean Payton stepping down as Head Coach. Will he pursue something in the media, or look to coach elsewhere? NFL Network's David Carr discusses the most likely landing spot for Aaron Rodgers. And Tim Kurkjian explains what the process of getting Bonds and Clemens into the Hall of Fame through the Veterans Committee could look like.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
